mobile_country_code.description: Region code that matches the specific country calling code if the requested phone number type is mobile

mobile_network_code.description: National destination code (NDC), with a 0 prefix, if an NDC is found and the requested phone number type is mobile

name.description: SPID (Service Provider ID) name, if the requested phone number has been ported; otherwise, the name of carrier who owns the phone number block

type.description: A phone number type that identifies the type of service associated with the requested phone number

normalized_carrier.description: If known to Telnyx and applicable, the primary network carrier.
